Text: I\'ve seeded 14 copies of this, and will continue to seed for 1 week more.  I\'d hate to see this swarm die out as this is a great series; hopefully people will take over and continue to seed.

Thanks so much for sharing and seeding this.  I was first introduced to Oz & James Drink to Britain and fell in love with the series.  I am so excited to get series 1 & 2 now!  I'll continue to seed this for ages.
